website_summaries.verdict: For those serious about using a hex bar for their weightlifting, this model has a number of desirable features.
pros: Decent price point, considering you're receiving a chrome finish
Design includes the ability to flip the hex bar over to change the type of grip
Should stand up to even the toughest workouts, as it can handle up to 500 pounds
cons: Occasionally may find problems with dents or other damage to the bar when it arrives

customer_reviews.title: If you're fat, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that I was too big to fit in the hex. I was wrong. There is sufficient space for a fat lard like myself at 5'7 and 270Ibs. I will be using this to get back into shape. Because the movements are easy for me and prolly for any fat people out there doubting. This would be a good thing to buy because you can strengthen your legs and that will make you faster so that you can run or walk longer and faster.
customer_reviews.author: DPC

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PIECE OF EQUIPMENT
customer_reviews.text: I have been an olympic weightlifter since I was twenty years old. I am now 65 and continue to lift, but lifting from the ground is a little dangerous as you get older. I have been dead lifting from blocks but decided to try the hex bar. This bar is EXCELLENT. I am sorry I did not purchase it years ago. I can go low, or high, makes no difference. Puts much less stress on my lower back and yet really works the hips, thighs and upper back as well as grip strength. Glad I purchased it as it is well made
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Jacobelli

customer_reviews.title: Great bar - sturdy, chrome.
customer_reviews.text: Great bar - sturdy, good welds, chrome - especially for the price. Would buy again. Comes with 2 clamps, but only 1 clamp came with mine. Had an issue getting it replaced, which Amazon does not want me talking about here, but the bar is great.
customer_reviews.author: W. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great trap bar!
customer_reviews.text: Great trap bar! After reading some reviews, I was concerned about the bar being damaged during shipping. Looks like Titan responded to customers concerns. The bar showed up in perfect condition and was packed with wood supports to help eliminate damage. The bar itself is awesome. Used it for the first time yesterday and loved it. I stay away from straight bar deadlifts due to a 'tweaky' lower back. My back felt great using the trap bar and put it in a much less vulnerable position. Highly recommend this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar other than the finish!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice bar, welds are decent and the packaging is ok. I think it’ll hold up ok but was a little disappointed in some of the rusting already when I pulled it out of the package! I wasn’t expecting rust on brand new chrome...but functionally it’s gonna work great! I’m sure you can buy nicer ones for more money but this will definitely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: TARA L MCDERMIT

customer_reviews.title: Grips too small
customer_reviews.text: The small grips on this bar force you to buy a rubberized grip to increase the diameter. The knurl is also as rough as a cheese grater. Otherwise it's pretty decent. I can't imagine trying to lift without rubber grips on these small handles with such an aggressive knurl.
customer_reviews.author: Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Great bar but not for heavy reps
customer_reviews.text: great trap bar, very similar to the ones you would find in commercial gyms. Unfortunately for me I use Olympic plates and there’s no way I can put 500lbs on there, I think max you can is 3x 45s on each side and maybe couple 10s. So if you looking to go heavy, this bar is limited, with that said I m sure iron plates won’t have that problem. Another minor disappointment was the color, on the picture it looks black but out of the box it’s that bright chrome. It’s not big deal but I would have liked to have the black one
customer_reviews.author: kevin Masson

customer_reviews.title: Great bar so far
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise purchase for my hubby since I heard him talking about it. We received the Bar quickly and although the bar looks steel/Black in the picture it was actually chrome when we received it. The color not a big deal because he still loved it, he’s already using it and so far holding the weights he’s using. There was no damage or broken parts so thank you for a successful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CTucker

customer_reviews.title: Great bar; great value!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this trap bar; especially considering it's price point! The knurling is grippy, yet still comfortable; and the chrome finish looks great. The fact that clips are included is an awesome little bonus. Can't wait to load it up and move some weight! But I do agree with a lot of the other reviews in that the box arrived pretty banged up, but I'll give FedEx the benefit of the doubt since it's a relatively heavy item and is pretty cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar for far less than several other brands. Bar is solid and heavy (45lbs). There are no rough edges and will support the weight. Great addition to my gym and I highly recommend it. Deadlift, bent rows, shrugs and more. I've never used one before but this lets me work with heavier weights without compromising form.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Deadlifts
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the sturdiness of this piece of equipment. I had read in an article that the hex bar is the best for doing deadlifts without causing stress or injury. It is heavy, 44 lbs, all by itself but at age 75 I am able to use it for deadlifts in a safe way. More weight can be added to the side bars but I suspect it will be a long time before I do that. Also, I had questions for the Titan Fitness staff and they were very helpful indeed.
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: Just Get It
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best deal out there for a quality hex bar. If you have been thinking about getting one, watch some you tube videos on the benefits of using one and then decide. As for Titan I can not say enough. This is built solid, heavy duty, priced good and packaged well. The shipping was super fast (it was Fed Ex to me in only 2 days). Have fun with it and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAR, GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar, especially for the price! It’s unbelievable how much some of these bars are selling for and I don’t see any difference between this bar and the higher priced ones. Also, if you are using Rogue weights or bumper plates they will fit in this bar. Rogue weights don’t fit on all of these type of bars so if you’re shopping around for one make sure you read the description carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a simple piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: the Hex Bar works great, no issues with getting plates on or off; I do use my own clamps to lock the plates on. The diamond pattern on the grips is really rough, rougher than on my barbell.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The Titan 2" Olympic Hex Bar is an awesome bar for the money. It is everything I expected and can accommodate any weight, up to 500 pounds, that I will ever be lifting. Having some problems with my lower back, I wish that I would have had this bar years ago, as for me, I can get in a much better position now to do any type of deadlifting.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel Barry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good value
customer_reviews.text: I have a bulging disc and I desperately need to get strengthen my lower back and glutes but deadlifting with a straight bar is damn near impossible. This hex bar allowed me to deadlift with some low weights as soon as I opened the box. Well constructed, good form factor. It works really well for me. I'm 6'3 196lbs with long arms. I feel the shape is perfect for a wide range of body types.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.

customer_reviews.title: Happily Surprised!!! LET'S GET IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I'm super impressed. It was very well packaged, the hex bar is extremely sturdy, it came with clips I wasn't aware of which is nice, and it I fit in no problem. I'm a fat boy trying to find my way again. At right under 309 lbs it's hard to find anything suitable for me. I got it yesterday morning and put my first work out in on it last night. Thank you for a remarkable product t.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar!
customer_reviews.text: The bar looks and feels great! Really professional piece of equipment. It came well packaged. I had originally ordered the same style bar by CAP, it was a black bar and came wrapped in cling film, it looked like it was tied to the back of the truck and dragged for 5 miles. I sent it back and got this bar and couldn't be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Wyeth Fetterman

customer_reviews.title: Quality hex bar for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of equipment for the money. I just got it today, it arrived well packed and in perfect shape the knurling is a bit aggressive., but if you do chin ups and play with kettlebells and barbells often enough you should already have sufficient calluses to hang with it, and if you're not, you may want to start training harder.
customer_reviews.author: Boonschlagen

customer_reviews.title: solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Solid bar. Bought weights somewhere else and they are slightly larger so there is a little bit of movement, but nothing that would bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cousineau

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Hex Bar at this price. I had to cover the knurling and it was little too rough but I also had that problem at the gym I went to. This is the Hex Bar to buy. I have 340 lbs on it right now and it's working great for deadlifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O

customer_reviews.title: Great to have, and like new after a hard year
customer_reviews.text: I really think it is worth getting a hex bar for deadlifts alone, but it is also super for shrugs, rows and farmers walks. I never plan to go back to straight bar deadlifts - this feels so much safer, and just as effective. After a year is a garage where dumbbells and plates rusted, this bar gleams like new.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Haffey

customer_reviews.title: Works better then advertised
customer_reviews.text: At 58 and rotater problems,I need to still do squats worked great modified deadlifts also , shrugs as well I added IADU collars. Excellent construction. No flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Vince V

customer_reviews.title: Works like it’s suppose to
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than a straight bar for my back when doing deadlifts , im 44 so it’s not form for those of you bout to spit bs
customer_reviews.author: Troy Cothren

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bar for amazing price! This bar is a great addition to any gym or home gym. If you are a serious powerlifter you'll need an extended bar but this works great for up to 5 plates!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive clips. Was suppose to come with clips. When I contacted Titan about this issue, Ralf really didnt seem to care. Will no longer purchase Titan products because of how the situation was handled.
customer_reviews.author: GLutzJr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this thing! And I’ve used it as well! It is incredibly sturdy, easy to load and unload, perfect shape for squats, wide enough for deadlifts and farmers carry. Good grip. Do you know how much it would cost to ship this if it wasn’t for amazon? Awesome deal and quality = happy hubby.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice construction! The chrome is nice and the knurling on the handles are not too aggressive. I would prefer if the the handles were thicker, they cut into my hands something fierce, but that seems to be common with most trap bars for whatever reason.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Estrada

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for several weeks and love it. I dont see any issues with the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is something I wasnt sure if would help with my deadlifts. I have used it for several weeks and love it. I dont see any issues with the quality it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: nick k

customer_reviews.title: Great hec bar
customer_reviews.text: Solid well made not much else to say the knurling is very aggressive to me so gonna sand it down a touch, may just wear gloves as that will be nice for maxing out. But that is lifters preference better it be to much than to little, to much you can fix.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: The box was a little tore up when I got home but the bar inside was fine. I've only used it once but it does what I bought it for, farmers walk, shrugs, and deadlifts. Seems sturdy, welds are decent, and the clips were included. The bar has some serious knurling. My hands are pretty calloused from lifting but I could definitely feel it.
customer_reviews.author: tinbeater

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Solid heavy duty bar! Great purchase at a low price. They shipped it the same day I purchased it. Can’t wait to slap some weights on it and slam it on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way
customer_reviews.text: I spent a little more to get this particular hex weight lifting bar. I'm really glad I did. My first impression was the packaging. It was excellent. I like everything about bar - the luster (for a lack of better words) of the metal, the welds, etc. If you are in the market for a hex bar, you can't go wrong with this one. I am 100% pleased!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Well built and exactly what my husband wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting one of these forever. I got him this for Christmas. The box showed up damaged so he recognized it before I could wrap it. He was so excited he wanted to use it "now". He used it tonight and says it feels really sturdy, the knurls give him a great grip and he loves that it forces you to use good form when lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to supplement my home gym, at the recommendation of my trainer. It is very well engineered, certainly capable of carrying a load heavier than I'll ever lift. It has a professional finish, and came with two spring clips (which I wasn't expecting). On top of all of this, it came 2 days ahead of the scheduled delivery date. So far, I'm very pleased with the product -- very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Shrug machine
customer_reviews.text: No flash just straight down to business. Knurling is well done, welds are well done, the spring collars provide a grip workout all on their own. But if you're buying this you probably already have some others laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can I say?
customer_reviews.text: It's a very sturdy, heavy hex bar. My son likes it, and he's very picky about exercise equipment. It was pre-assembled, so no work involved. We just added weights. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ratchford

customer_reviews.title: Get it. You will be pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Bringing the gym home. Great bar. Son is very happy. He is able to continue his training at home (now tgat we are all sheltering in place)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Titan is great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Titan is great stuff for my outdoor gym, it's great quality and cost is low enough I am not afraid to USE it or cry when it gets rained on. I'll be buying more titan stuff I am sure, this is my third piece from them.
customer_reviews.author: sean nunnink

customer_reviews.title: ... I've Become a Trapaholic!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for deadlifts and shoulder shrugs. My shoulder shrug weight has increased 2x since incorporating the trap bar into my workout (vs dumbbells).
customer_reviews.author: JeffB

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any gym
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot equipment and bars. But, adding the trap bar has added all types of new exercises to my personal training and for my clients. Delivered on time and very secure
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: A must for home gyms
customer_reviews.text: Great price ,good quality, arrived on time. Great addition to my home gym . Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: william morrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the product for a college gym facility as it has been highly requested. The product came in great condition with a protective covering during the shipping process. This a great sturdy product for the price. You can't beat it. As of now, we are extremely happy with this purchase. Will follow back in a couple of months with more feedback!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when it was supposed to, in perfect condition and worked as expected during my first workout. Welds look solid and chrome was in good shape. Would buy again but hopefully there will be no need!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Bracey

customer_reviews.title: The smartest way to deadlift
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this bar no more squats or deadlift with a bar it’s real fun to use .get this bar man it’s a must for a home gym. Add it today
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Son really likes this bar a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Chalky cole

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN ADVERTISED!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Arrived 2 weeks early. It was packaged very well. The stainless steel is high quality and feels much heavier than listed. It arrived with 2 spring loaded collar clamps. I used it for the first time yesterday and it felt great! It will be a game changer for my leg and back workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for home gyms. Pretty solid for regular use. I would not recommend for powerlifting although it can handle heavy loads. My bar is slightly bent from use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bar. My only issue is the grip on the handles are very textured to the point they tear up my hands. I had to wrap them. The welds are a little sloppy in places, but otherwise I am VERY pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Hartleb

customer_reviews.title: It’s just another hex bar
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hex bar, not much to say. You know what you’re getting when you purchase. It’s Olympic sized so your Olympic sized plates will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Not commercial gym quality, but for the serious home gym it's a great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Sloth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bar
customer_reviews.text: The great quality I always get with Titan products. Bar was packaged well,which with Titan isn't always the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar. Very nice quality for the money. Great for a different type of deadlift as well as the obvious shrugs.
customer_reviews.author: dbonez88

customer_reviews.title: Knurling is annoying
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Knurling is super aggressive and ripped off one of my callouses on first usage. Gonna try some chalk and see if that helps
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar.
customer_reviews.text: The bar looks well constructed and the finish also lools good. The spacing between the handles may be a little wide for a person with shorter arms but in general I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimito el Cartero

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: I would say it was here pretty quick, and it was as described. I wouldn't feel comfortable putting more than 300lbs on it.It feels hollowed and lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid hex bar and the handles have excellent grip. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home gym. We use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He likes the safety and the sturdiness of this bar. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Hex Cage for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the bar, the bar has a great finish. Only problem I have is the spring collars that come with bars will not open wide enough to go onto the bar to hold the plates in place, I have enough collars to replace those and they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my home gym to train my clients. I love it...clients?!?! Well that may be a different story 😊!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hatton-William

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value! I have used this bar for close to a year now and I am thoroughly pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: great bar
customer_reviews.text: excellent made bar. regular squats hurt my back, this makes the weight angles more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: no assembly required
customer_reviews.text: The packaging of the hex bar was fantastic.plenty styrofoam and plastic so there was absolutely no damage on shipment.a great value for its price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I was very nervous about the quality of the bar due to the low price. Once I saw the welds and quality of the steel when I opened the box, I knew I had a quality bar. I’ve had it now a little over 5 weeks and have put about 20 sessions on it and I am happy to report no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made Trap Bar. Used it the first day I received it. This is a very well made piece of equipment. It should last me a very long time. Chrome finish looks great too. Arrived in a very quick timeframe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Titan Fitness Bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hex bar to train for the new Army ACFT. IT IS NOT THE BAR IN THE PICTURES. Missing handle in even with the bar. Which is the one you have to use. Also not enough room on the bar for 340 lb using bumber plates. Also came with rust on it cuz of bad welds.
customer_reviews.author: Man w/ hands

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Was packaged very well. My bar has no defects.
customer_reviews.author: New Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working nice
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a month and it’s a solid piece
customer_reviews.author: John T Kozlik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.text: This feel like it is well balanced and sturdy. Hopefully it will prove to be durable over time.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great bar, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great bar at a great price. It is exactly as described by seller. Was not damaged at all, in fact there was wooden crating inside the box which was nice to see. I would highly recommend this bar
customer_reviews.author: Raymontbears

customer_reviews.title: not really what i expected
customer_reviews.text: after trying it, im a little diapointed. not really the right size for what i needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Connor McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for another way to add more leg routines to my workout and I found it with this bar. It arrived very well packaged. Bar is solid, well built and a great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bar. I have nothing bad to say about. The quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Il Duce

customer_reviews.title: Good, Useable Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, he took it to the gym and it worked very well for him and all of his lifting buddies.
customer_reviews.author: ask_questions

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bar for the price. I have several pieces from Titan and I have been pleased with everything so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jared L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Had the bar for two months now, works great helped a lot with the lower back pain I was experiencing while doing regular squats. I wish I would have purchased this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Well built for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived a little banged up, but it's hard do damage a hex bar. Solid construction, clean welds, and it was cheaper than anything I could find in the stores. Quickly becoming a big fan of Titan products!
customer_reviews.author: greg mullins

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my home gym. Very sturdy and suits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: definitely a tremendous value! rogue and other fitness companies are charging $300 plus for a comparable piece of equipment, and this bar is just as strong and high quality as the competition
customer_reviews.author: justin dupree

customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome I like everything about it. I saw early reviews that complained about not having enough knocking on the bar. Apparently they fixed that. Perfect level of knurlung on the bar. Not so much to require gloves but all you need for grip.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Everything as promised. Arrived quickly and the product seems to be of good quality. Have only used it once since I just recieved it but looks and feels good and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: John H Galey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: First one got lost by the shipper (How do you lose a package that big?) Titan was quick to react and replace it, a very pleasant surprise, no jumping through hoops, one email and done! The bar itself is of even better quality than I expected for this price point. Thanks Titan Fitness!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: One of the most versatile pieces of fitness equipment I now own.
customer_reviews.text: Great for not only for trapezius shoulder development farmer walks, pushups military press chest press, bent over rows. I have found lots of uses via you tube videos.
customer_reviews.author: eric cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than I expected but a good, solid bar nonetheless....
customer_reviews.author: Eric V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I’m a little disappointed. The bar is bent
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed. The bar is bent, some welds have rust, the sleeves have rust, the caps of the sleeves were clearly blemished. The bar honestly looks like it came to me used. It’s still a solid bar And will do the job. But I feel like I bought something for a new price and received a used product.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Great product quality
customer_reviews.text: This product came as advertised. All one piece in a giant box. Showed up on time with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Remijio garza

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Sturdy. Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Had read other bad reviews, but I have no complaints. Sturdy product. Great, clean welds. Textured grips are perfect. Highly recommend this Hex bar.
customer_reviews.author: David Tingler

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong for the price. The chrome playing will flake but again couldn’t care less for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon A. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great bar!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this bar. Solid and strong...I’m a big guy and I put some serious weight on it with no issues. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gaydo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment! Exactly what I was looking for, great condition, well made!
customer_reviews.author: Joel R Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The bar is great as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The bar is great as advertised! The shipping...not so great. It came in a box with several large holes in it. And it was missing one of the locking clamps. Presumably fell out of one of the holes
customer_reviews.author: Mike Colella

customer_reviews.title: quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived well packaged, including some wood board to reinforce box. Very nice bar with no defects in finish or construction.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Seems they stepped up their game!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like after all the negative feedback, Titan fixed the issues. The bar came brace with plywood in a cardboard box sealed in plastic. The welds looked sufficient and is perfectly shiny and polished.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Khat

customer_reviews.title: We'll made hex bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: We'll made just what my son was looking at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Haglund

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just received but appears to be very well made. looking forward to breaking it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bar. Heavy duty and sturdy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Great bar. I have a basement gym great addition to it. Very sturdy and the knurl was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Pasacreta

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves this and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Standard Size
customer_reviews.text: Strong product so far. Will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son-in-law for Christmas. He ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law for Christmas. He loves it lifting with this does not strain his back as much.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy
